name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Vegetables
instructions: Season the chicken and grill it; steam or sauté the vegetables.
image_prompt: Grilled chicken breast with grill marks served with steamed broccoli and zucchini slices.

name: Tuna and Bean Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients and serve with lemon juice and black pepper.
image_prompt: Fresh salad bowl mixed with tuna chunks, beans, lettuce, and olives.

name: Zucchini and Mushroom Stir-fry
instructions: Sauté the onion, add vegetables, and cover the pan to cook in their own juices.
image_prompt: Pan filled with sautéed zucchini, mushrooms, and tomatoes.

name: Oven-Baked Salmon
instructions: Season the fish and bake for 20 minutes at 180°C.
image_prompt: Baked salmon fillet with lemon slices on top and dill garnish.

name: Diet Caesar Salad
instructions: Use a mix of yogurt, garlic, and mustard instead of mayonnaise.
image_prompt: Diet Caesar salad with grilled chicken strips and yogurt dressing.

name: Lentils with Angelica (Adasi)
instructions: Cook lentils with onion and potato until thick.
image_prompt: Bowl of thick lentil soup (Adasi) sprinkled with angelica powder.

name: Oil-Free Pan Kebab
instructions: Knead meat and onion, then cook in a non-stick pan without oil.
image_prompt: Lean beef kebab strips cooked in a pan with roasted tomatoes.

name: Vegetable Pasta (Low Carb)
instructions: Sauté the vegetables and mix with drained pasta.
image_prompt: Whole wheat pasta mixed with colorful sautéed vegetables.

name: Oven-Baked Chicken Schnitzel
instructions: Dip chicken in egg white and breadcrumbs, bake on parchment paper (do not fry).
image_prompt: Oven baked chicken schnitzel, golden and crispy without deep frying.

name: Grilled Shrimp
instructions: Marinate shrimps, put on wooden skewers, and grill.
image_prompt: Grilled shrimp skewers with char marks served with lime.

name: Brown Rice Green Bean Pilaf (Lubia Polo)
instructions: Cook like traditional Lubia Polo but with very little oil and brown rice.
image_prompt: Brown rice mixed with green beans and meat, healthy version of Lubia Polo.

name: Red Lentil Soup (Dal Adas)
instructions: Cook lentils with onion, garlic, and paste until thick and spicy.
image_prompt: Spicy red lentil soup (Dal Adas) garnished with cilantro.

name: Chicken Lettuce Wraps
instructions: Place ingredients inside lettuce leaves and wrap like a taco (no bread).
image_prompt: Lettuce wraps filled with shredded chicken and veggies.

name: Eggplant Stew (Diet Yatimeche)
instructions: Dice eggplants and steam/sauté with tomatoes and garlic.
image_prompt: Stew of eggplant and tomatoes cooked together without excess oil.

name: Turkey Steak
instructions: Pound the turkey and grill in a cast-iron pan.
image_prompt: Grilled turkey breast steak served with a side salad.

name: Quinoa and Vegetable Bowl
instructions: Arrange all ingredients in a bowl and enjoy with lemon juice.
image_prompt: Buddha bowl with quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, and fresh veggies.

name: Fat-Burning Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop all vegetables and boil in water until soft.
image_prompt: Bowl of clear vegetable soup with cabbage, celery, and carrots.

name: Chicken Kotlet (Oil-Free)
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake in a diet pan or oven.
image_prompt: Chicken patties (Kotlet) baked to a golden brown color.

name: Pan-Seared Saffron Chicken Cubes
instructions: Marinate the chicken and sauté with vegetables in a pan.
image_prompt: Pan seared saffron chicken cubes with bell peppers.

name: Cauliflower Rice (Keto)
instructions: Grate the cauliflower (rice-like) and sauté until soft.
image_prompt: Cauliflower rice cooked with saffron, looking like traditional rice.

name: Low-Fat Celery Stew (Khoresht Karafs)
instructions: Sauté herbs with very little oil and simmer the stew.
image_prompt: Lean Celery Stew (Khoresht Karafs) with fresh green herbs.

name: Turkey Burger (No Bun)
instructions: Grill the patty and serve inside lettuce leaves with tomato.
image_prompt: Turkey burger patty served inside a lettuce bun with tomato.

name: Greek Salad with Chicken
instructions: Mix chopped vegetables with chicken, cheese, and olive oil.
image_prompt: Greek salad with feta cubes, olives, and grilled chicken slices.

name: Zucchini Noodles (Zoodles)
instructions: Spiralize the zucchini and sauté for 1 minute with garlic.
image_prompt: Spiralized zucchini noodles (Zoodles) sautéed with garlic.

name: Pinto Bean Stew with Mushrooms
instructions: Make a thick bean stew and add sautéed mushrooms.
image_prompt: Warm bowl of Pinto Bean Stew with mushrooms.

name: Baked Herb Frittata (Kuku Sabzi)
instructions: Pour the mixture into a greased mold and bake in the oven.
image_prompt: Slice of baked Herb Frittata (Kuku Sabzi) showing fluffy texture.

name: Lemon Tilapia Fillet
instructions: Sauté the fish in a pan with a little butter and lemon juice.
image_prompt: Pan fried Tilapia fillet with lemon butter sauce.

name: Spinach and Eggs (Nargesi)
instructions: Sauté spinach until water evaporates, then crack eggs on top.
image_prompt: Spinach and eggs dish (Nargesi) cooked in a skillet.

name: Okra Stew with Chicken
instructions: Use chicken instead of red meat and lightly sauté the okra.
image_prompt: Okra stew made with chicken chunks and tomato sauce.

name: Whole Wheat Pasta Salad
instructions: Mix cold pasta with vegetables and yogurt sauce.
image_prompt: Cold whole wheat pasta salad with colorful peppers and corn.

name: Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Form small meatballs and cook in tomato sauce (no deep frying).
image_prompt: Small meatballs simmering in a rich red tomato sauce.

name: Cauliflower Rice and Shrimp
instructions: Sauté shrimp and garlic, add grated cauliflower and stir-fry.
image_prompt: Cauliflower rice stir-fry with shrimp and cilantro.

name: Boiled Egg Sandwich
instructions: Slice the eggs and place inside barley bread.
image_prompt: Open faced sandwich with hard boiled egg slices on rye bread.

name: Ratatouille (Vegetable Stew)
instructions: Slice vegetables into rounds, arrange them in a dish, and cook with sauce.
image_prompt: Traditional Ratatouille dish with spiraled vegetable slices.

name: Orange Chicken (Diet)
instructions: Slow cook chicken with orange juice and saffron until sauce thickens.
image_prompt: Orange glazed chicken served with cooked carrots.

name: Chickpea and Quinoa Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients for a complete healthy lunch.
image_prompt: Fresh salad bowl with chickpeas, quinoa, and chopped parsley.

name: Diet Eggplant Borani
instructions: Mash grilled eggplant and mix with yogurt and garlic.
image_prompt: Bowl of eggplant dip (Borani) garnished with walnuts.

name: Oat Soup with Chicken
instructions: Cook oats, chicken, and carrots in chicken broth until thickened.

name: Hosseini Kebab (Wooden Skewers)
instructions: Skewer meat and vegetables, then cook in a tomato and water sauce.
image_prompt: Wooden skewers with meat and veggies cooked in a tomato sauce.

name: Baghali Ghatogh (Lima Bean Stew)
instructions: Sauté beans with garlic and dill, cook, then add an egg at the end.
image_prompt: Traditional Northern Iranian dish (Baghali Ghatogh) with beans and dill.

name: Herb Rice with Fish (Oven-Baked)
instructions: Grill the fish in the oven and serve with low-oil herb rice.

name: Mushroom and Beef Stir-fry
instructions: Sauté beef and onion, then add mushrooms and bell pepper.

name: Diet Macaroni Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients and season with yogurt sauce and lemon juice.
image_prompt: Pasta salad with veggies and chicken, dressed with creamy yogurt.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Cook tomatoes and vegetables, then blend into a puree.
image_prompt: Bowl of rich red creamy tomato soup with basil leaf.

name: Tas Kebab (Oil-Free)
instructions: Layer the ingredients, add a little water and tomato paste, and simmer.

name: Spinach and Prune Stew (with Chicken)
instructions: Sauté spinach and add to cooked chicken and prunes.

name: Steamed Fish with Vegetables
instructions: Steam fish and vegetables together for a healthy meal.

name: Savory Chicken Oatmeal (Lunch)

name: Eggplant Pizza (No Crust)

name: Kashk Kadoo (Zucchini with Whey)

name: Eggplant Walnut Rolls

name: Lentil Rice with Dates (Meatless)

name: Green Bean Stew (Ragout)

name: Cold Chicken Sandwich
